sentence.Network_en: Alex only took up the pianoforte when he was 14.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚历克斯到14岁时才开始学钢琴.

sentence.Network_en: A key is the part of a pianoforte that you touch to make music.
sentence.Network_cn: 琴键是钢琴上用手指敲击的部件,它能使钢琴发出乐音.

sentence.Network_en: Clementi's Gradus ad Parnassum is an important work in pianoforte - history. "
sentence.Network_cn: 克列门蒂的《名手之道》是钢琴艺术史上一部重要的作品.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 象牙钢琴(lvories):钢琴的俗称(1855),由钢琴琴键使用的材料得名。 钢琴(Klavier):德语中表示任何键盘乐器,但通常都用来指代钢琴。 钢琴(Pianoforte):意大利语的.

attraverso un pianoforte 她温柔地滑过琴键 la morte è lontana, 死亡已离我们远去 io vivo per lei. 我整个生命都属于她 Je vis pour elle jour après.
attraverso un pianoforte 经由琴音 la morte è lontana, 死亡已经远离 io vivo per lei. 我为她而活 Vivo per lei che spesso sa 我为她而活 essere.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from Italian, earlier piano e forte 'soft and loud', expressing the gradation in tone

means.word_mean: 1. a stringed instrument that is played by depressing keys that cause hammers to strike tuned strings and produce sounds
